name: judgejudge
title: 题解 CF938A 【Word Correction】

content:
var i,j,k,n:longint;s:string;
    begin
      readln(n);//n其实没什么用
      readln(s);//读入
      i:=1;s:=s+' ';//以防万一
      while i+1<length(s) do
        begin
          while (s[i] in ['a','e','i','o','u','y'])
          and(s[i+1] in ['a','e','i','o','u','y'])
            do delete(s,i+1,1);//一定要用while
          inc(i);//下一个
        end;
      writeln(s);
    end.
